comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
In this Bain/LOC photo, taken at the docking of the IMPERATOR on July 17, 1913, Big Tim Sullivan is the tall man at the right. Dying of syphilis, maybe he already knew that he would be dead by the end of August:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3774616955/sizes/o/]
